body:
Hi Guys,
I'm setting up an energy simulation where I look at the heat gain from solar radiation. The simulation runs and I'm getting data for all of my windows, however EpSurfResult won't color them. It may have to do with me splitting the wall surfaces to give me two separate windows, but I'm not sure. I checked to make sure that the surfaces in question were labelled as windows in my zones as well. Thanks, John
topic: Windows not being colored from ReadEpSurfResult
